question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2001 WDC?

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2003 WDC?
extra: After serving as a test driver for Renault in 2002, 2003 was Alonso's first season as a Renault race driver, where he became the youngest ever to secure pole position and win in F1 at the time.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2004 WDC?
extra: 2004 was a successful season for Renault drivers Alonso and Trulli (who left mid-year), though not quite close enough to the record-breaking Ferrari F2004 of Michael Schumacher.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2005 WDC?
extra: McLaren and Renault took advantage of a regulatory change that penalised Ferrari, and fought for the title between their main drivers Räikkönen and Alonso; McLaren had a faster car but their reliability problems allowed Alonso to win his first F1 Championship.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2006 WDC?
extra: An epic and hard-fought season against Michael Schumacher. The Renault R26 started the season with greater pace, but Ferrari then fought back. A good management of the initial points cushion and great performances by Alonso were enough to become double world champion.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2007 WDC?
extra: Rivalry, drama, espionage... A complete thriller of a season, race by race, with McLaren drivers Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso battling for the championship, just for Ferrari's Räikkönen to snatch it at the final race by a single point.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2008 WDC?
extra: After leaving McLaren in difficult terms, Alonso returned to Renault for two seasons. The R28 struggled at the start of the season but updates increased its competitiveness and Fernando won in Japan and the controversial Singapore Grand Prix.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2010 WDC?
extra: Alonso's first attempt at the world championship with Ferrari was in 2010. A highly competitive season in which four drivers were in contention going into the final race, but Fernando's chances vanished after a strategy error by Ferrari.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2012 WDC?
extra: Possibly Alonso's best season in terms of performance in F1, managing to fight for the world championship with an F2012 that many believed should not even have been in contention; but it was not enough and Sebastian Vettel became a three-time world champion.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2013 WDC?
extra: In the 2013 season, Ferrari started competitive and Alonso achieved great performances in China and Spain; even so, a tyre change that benefited Red Bull made it impossible to fight for the championship and allowed Vettel to dominate the rest of the year.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2014 WDC?
extra: Alonso's final year with Ferrari was difficult. Under the new hybrid regulations, the Ferrari F14T suffered from serious shortcomings, although these did not prevent Alonso from achieving great results in China and Hungary. He left for McLaren-Honda next year.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2016 WDC?
extra: After a very difficult initial season at McLaren-Honda, 2016 seemed to bring a slight improvement in competitiveness, although the drivers continued to suffer as Honda would once again encounter problems in 2017 following a change in engine architecture.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2018 WDC?
extra: 2018 was Fernando's last F1 season before his first retirement. He then went on to try his luck in other competitions such as the World Endurance Championship, the Indianapolis 500, Daytona and the Dakar Rally.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2021 WDC?
extra: Returning to Formula One in 2021 with Alpine, after a period of adaptation he regained form in Baku and achieved good performances like the defensive action against Hamilton in Hungary and a podium in Qatar.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2023 WDC?
extra: Alonso's first season with Aston Martin was marked by great initial success, achieving three consecutive podiums thanks to a well-balanced AMR23. Mid-season onwards results became scarce due to ineffective updates, though Zandvoort and Brazil were brilliant performances.

question: Which position did Alonso finish in the F1 2025 WDC?
extra: 2025 was a season without great results, due to an AMR25 that lacked performance ahead of the major regulatory change in 2026. The most important moments were the signing of Adrian Newey in March and the 5th place finish in Hungary.
